mapper.select: select IF(max(cast(barcode_number as unsigned int)) = '' || max(cast(barcode_number as unsigned int)) = NULL, '100000001', max(cast(barcode_number as unsigned int)) + 1) from check_application where hosnum = #{hosNum}
